mapper.select: select id ,convert(varchar(10),start_dt,120) as start_dt ,convert(varchar(10),end_dt,120) as end_dt ,convert(varchar(10),start_dt,120) + ' ~ ' + convert(varchar(10),end_dt,120) as trip_range ,destination ,memo ,(select caps_name from ks_user where id=kbt.crtd_id) as crtd_id ,crtd_dt ,(select caps_name from ks_user where id=kbt.mdfy_id) as mdfy_id ,mdfy_dt from ks_business_trip kbt where id=#{searchId}

select id ,convert(varchar(10),start_dt,120) as start_dt ,convert(varchar(10),end_dt,120) as end_dt ,destination ,memo ,(select caps_name from ks_user where id=kbt.crtd_id) as crtd_id ,crtd_dt ,(select caps_name from ks_user where id=kbt.mdfy_id) as mdfy_id ,mdfy_dt from ks_business_trip kbt where crtd_id=#{crtdId} and (start_dt between #{fromDate} and #{toDate} or end_dt between #{fromDate} and #{toDate})
